scripts.start-prod: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.prod.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.start-test: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.test.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.start-stage: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.stage.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build-prod: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.prod.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-test: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.test.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-stage: rm public/config/config.json && cp public/config/config.stage.json public/config/config.json && vue-cli-service build
